ARABIC: وَهَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ أَفَأَنتُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is a blessed Reminder which We have sent down. So are you going to ignore it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And this is a blessed reminder that We have sent down. Will you then deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is a Blessed Admonition that We have revealed. Are you, then, going to reject it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This (Quran) which We have revealed is a blessed reminder. Will you then deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is a blessed remembrance, sent down by Us; so do you deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And this is a blessed Reminder which We have sent down; will you then deny it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And this is a blessed Reminder which We have revealed; will you then deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And this is a blessed Remembrance that We have sent down; so are you now denying it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is a blessed Reminder that we have revealed: Will ye then reject it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is a blessed reminder that We have revealed to you. Will you then reject it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And this is an admonition blest, which We have sent down! will ye then be the rejectors thereof?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This [too] is a blessed reminder, which We have sent down. Will you then deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And this is a blessed Message which We have sent down: will ye then reject it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And this is a blessed Reminder (the Quran) which We have sent down, will you then (dare to) deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is a blessed Remembrance which We have sent down. Do you disbelieve it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This too is a blessed message that We revealed. Are you going to deny it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:50] And this, namely, the Qur’ān, is a blessed Remembrance which We have revealed. Will you then deny it? (the interrogative here is intended as a rebuke).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This) Qur'an (is a blessed Reminder) it contains mercy and forgiveness for he who believes in it (that We have revealed) We sent Gabriel with it: (Will ye) people of Mecca (then reject it) disbelieve in it?
